CustomField.formula:
IF ( LeadScore__c <=40, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_100.gif","1 Star"),
IF (LeadScore__c <=55, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_200.gif","2 Star"),
IF (LeadScore__c <=70, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif","3 Star"),
IF (LeadScore__c <=90, IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif","4 Star"),
IF ( ISBLANK(LastName), IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif",""),
IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif","5 Star"))))))
CustomField.label: Lead Ranking
